ps1.4:16.1: ca kho keci → ye keci kho (s1-3) | ye hi keci (pts1) | ye hi keci kho (mr)
ps1.4:82.1: Purimanidānaṃ → sāvatthinidānaṃ (bj) | paripuṇṇanidānaṃ (si, s1-3, mr) | pāripuṇṇanidānaṃ (pts1)
ps1.4:88.2: assaddhiyasaṃvaraṭṭhena → assaddhiyaṃ saṃvaraṭṭhena (si, s1-3, pts1, mr)
ps1.4:92.58: bhāvanāvasena → ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanāvasena (bj, s1-3, pts1, mr)
ps1.4:121.18: indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṃ → indriyaparopariyatte ñāṇaṃ (bj, pts1, c1) | indriyānaṃ paropariyatte ñāṇaṃ (s1-3)
